name: hcibrain-monorepo
description: HCIBrain Paper Skimming Assistant - Complete Full-Stack Application

scripts.backend:dev: cd packages/backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn src.hci_extractor.web.app:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 --reload
